Package jdrasil.sat.encodings

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicCardinalityEncoder
    This class provides methods to encode cardinality constraints into a formula of propositional logic.
    DecreasingCardinalityEncoder
    An decreasing cardinality constraint is an "atMostK" constraint that is reduced between multiple calls of the SAT solver.
    IncrementalCardinalityEncoder
    This class implements an incremental cardinality constraint for a given (fixed) formula and a given (fixed) set of variables.
